body_content.explanation: a pattern or structure made from horizontal and vertical lines crossing each other to form squares:
examples: A metal grid had been placed over the hole to prevent people from falling in.
In Barcelona the streets are laid out in/on a grid system.

body_content.explanation: a system of wires through which electricity is connected to different power stations across a region:
a pattern of squares with numbers or letters used to find places on a map
a pattern of lines marking the start of the track in motor racing (= a sport of racing very fast and powerful cars around a track):
examples: In all, 26 drivers will be on the starting grid tomorrow.
